About DissolvaGum

Our Story

The journey of DissolvaGum: from a simple idea to a revolutionary product.

The Spark of Innovation

"It all started at school," recalls Taksh Nahata. "Seeing gum stuck everywhere, including on my shoe, I realized this was a problem that needed solving. That moment sparked the idea for DissolvaGum."

This initial frustration led to years of research and collaboration, culminating in the creation of a gum that dissolves and leaves no mess behind.

Environmental Impact

Chewing responsibly: How DissolvaGum helps reduce waste and protect our planet.

The Problem with Traditional Gum

Traditional chewing gum is made from synthetic polymers, similar to plastics. It doesn't biodegrade, leading to unsightly litter on streets, under tables, and in public spaces. This waste is costly to clean up and contributes to plastic pollution.

DissolvaGum offers a clean alternative. By dissolving completely, it leaves no trace, helping keep our environment cleaner, one chew at a time.

Did you know?

It can cost local councils significant amounts annually to remove conventional gum litter from pavements.

Meet the Team

The passionate individuals bringing DissolvaGum to life.

Taksh Nahata

CEO

Taksh is the visionary who started DissolvaGum after experiencing the frustration of gum stuck to his shoe. His determination to solve this problem led to the creation of our innovative product.

Tarakesvaran Aravindaan

Product Manager

Tarakesvaran brings his expertise in product development and sustainability to the team, ensuring that DissolvaGum is both effective and eco-friendly.

Chanakya Mudhuganti

Chief Financial Officer

Chanakya oversees DissolvaGum’s financial strategy and operations, ensuring sustainable growth and responsible resource management. His analytical mindset and attention to detail keep our mission on solid financial ground.

Shivam Sharma

Chief Marketing Officer

Shivam is the creative force behind our marketing campaigns, spreading the word about DissolvaGum's mission and benefits.

DissolvaGum

Chew Some Gum, Skip the Mess. Eco-friendly, long-lasting, and no sticky waste.
